attributes.action: Create an "ANSWERS TO PETITIONS" Web Site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ALL accepted petitions deserve a decent reply, even if it is negative, it should have an official parliamentary basis - it is in fact a question from the public which might be answered at "Question Time"
No silly answers,no obfuscations.
Also publish in the press for those who do not have  PC`s

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
